items.title: ‘Clinical-grade AI’: a new buzzy AI word that means absolutely nothing

items.title: Game deals: Cronos New Dawn $40 low, MGS Delta, WWE 2K25 for Switch 2, more
items.summary:
As part of its pre-Black Friday Doorbuster sale, Best Buy has a number of notable console game deals running right now. Alongside the new all-time low we featured on Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater over the week, you’ll also find deals on WWE 2K25 for Nintendo Switch 2 down at $59.99 as well as Cronos: The New Dawn on PS5 down at $39.99 shipped from the regular $60 MSRP. Still up at the full list on Amazon, this is the lowest price we have ever tracked on this “brutal third-person survival horror” experience. It includes “exclusive in-game content and collectibles” like the Traveler skin, “a cache of valuable supplies,” and a set of collectible stickers to decorate your gear.

items.title: Samsung’s 2025 43-inch 4K UHD M7 Smart Monitor now down to its lowest price at $175 off
items.summary:
Update: As part of its updated Samsung monitor sale, Woot is offering the brand’s latest 43-inch M7 (M70F) Smart Monitor for $324.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is the lowest price we have tracked for this 4K UHD display, and you’ll find more details in the below post.

As part of its wider sale on Samsung monitors, Woot is offering the brand’s latest 43-inch M7 (M70F) Smart Monitor for $359.99 $324.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is regularly a $500 display that recently hit the scene as part of Samsung’s Smart Monitor lineup. It dropped to the $380 mark earlier this month during the fall Prime Day sale at Amazon, but today’s deal at Woot steps it up with an additional $20 $55 discount. This is the lowest we have seen this 43-inch M70F variant fetch to date, so be sure to cash in before it jumps back up to its full price. Alternatively, you can save more on this monitor if you don’t mind picking up an open box unit directly from Samsung at $319.99 shipped. Head below for more details.

Jordyn Holman / New York Times:
Q&A with Bill Ready, who became Pinterest's CEO in 2022, about changes during his tenure, winning over Gen Z, Pinterest's business model, AI content, and more  —  Bill Ready, the company's chief executive, is shifting the virtual pinboard platform toward shopping and things that “make you feel better.”

items.title: You Can Now Generate Presentations With Google Gemini
items.summary:

items.title: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater hits Amazon all-time low (FREE Sneaking DLC Pack included)
items.summary:
We are now tracking the first chance to save on the physical PS5 copy of the new Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater Tactical Edition at $59.88 shipped at Amazon. This deal is also live at Walmart. Regularly $70, you’re looking at a nearly 15% price drop and a new Amazon all-time low. This is the Tactical Edition that includes the base game on the disc as well as a voucher for the regularly $15 Sneaking DLC Pack with 10 cosmetic items and the White Tuxedo. If you’re yet to pick up this frankly quite impressive remake of the MGS classic, you can now do so on Amazon with a nice little price drop – the first notable discount we have tracked there to date.
